name: dev-toolbox
title: Dev Toolbox
description: All-in-one developer toolkit with time conversion, password generation, network info, and spell checking
author: brians_tjipto

commands.name: convert-time-formats
commands.title: Convert Time Formats
commands.subtitle: Dev Toolbox
commands.description: Convert between time formats (natural language, ISO, unix)

commands.name: generate-secure-password
commands.title: Generate Secure Password
commands.subtitle: Dev Toolbox
commands.description: Create random passwords with customizable parameters

commands.name: show-network-information
commands.title: Show Network Information
commands.subtitle: Dev Toolbox
commands.description: Display IP addresses (v4/v6), MAC, and interface details

commands.name: spell-check-thesaurus
commands.title: Spell Check & Thesaurus
commands.subtitle: Dev Toolbox
commands.description: Get definitions, spell check, and synonyms for words

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
